comment: Easy A. External learning tool that requires bare minimum effort. No essays or anything like that. Just simple assignments. Just kind of busy work, but it wont take more than an hour or so of your time every two weeks when everything for a module is due. You wont actually talk to professor at all. She wont answer emails anyway lol.
Would smash her textbook to the ground. No help at all. Shes alright. Just dont use the textbook. She is a nice lady though. Just the textbook is no help
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Take this class online if you can because ALL of the work is done online in Bearface. I regret taking the classroom version due to her strict attendance policy, despite the classes contributing almost nothing and all material and homework being online. Nice enough lady although she was a little too into it for just a required gen ed class.
sweetest teacher ever, and is super understanding. even though you have to come to class she makes it kinda interesting. all the work is online and is the easiest A ive ever received.

Prof. McCall is a good instructor; not wonderful, not terrible. You get 2 free absences, and then it begins to count against you. She offers lots of extra credit. There are in-class participation activities that are generally not pre-announced, so try to attend. Don't take the class if you can help it, but she's a solid choice.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: If possible, I recommend taking either a Hybrid or online course. The majority of this class is online, however if you don't take the online courses, it is mandatory to come everyday. Professor McCall is super sweet and really knows her material. She inspires the best of her students and encourages us to do what will make us happy and healthy.

She's great! The only thing I didn't like was that she took attendance when all of the assignments are online. DO NOT miss an assignment, it takes a huge effect on your grade. however, the assignments are very easy. I did them all just a few hours before they were due. she's super nice and passionate and offers extra credit. Insanely easy A.

She's a really sweet lady. Have to show up to class if you want the easy A, which can be tough considered 95% of the class is online. She makes lectures entertaining though and likes to get the class involved. Definitely would not take for a 9:30 that was my biggest mistake. TURN IN ALL ASSIGNMENTS ONLINE, if you miss a major one you will get a B.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Mrs. McCall is a great teacher. She is young an passionate about her profession. I took the actual class rather than online, and managed to finish with a 96 in the class. If you show up and participate it will be a fun and easy class. I recommend taking her course. You are allowed 2 absences and you have 3 easy extra credit opportunities. 10/10
